backend/main.mo: Defines user profiles, access control, and core game logic including players, tables, state management, and profile persistence.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented PWA, service worker, and Android TWA features with associated files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short descriptions of every major frontend file including components, screens, hooks, PWA assets, and Android TWA configuration.
frontend/android-twa/app/build.gradle: Android app module Gradle config defining package metadata, SDK versions, dependencies, and build settings.
ProGuard rules preserving androidbrowserhelper classes and suppressing warnings.
frontend/android-twa/app/src/main/Androi: Android manifest defining permissions, TWA activity setup, intent filters, splash settings, and UI metadata.
frontend/android-twa/app/src/main/java/c: Main Android activity extending LauncherActivity for TWA startup behavior.
frontend/android-twa/app/src/main/res/va: Defines color resources used for TWA splash and system bars.
String resources including app name, host, and default TWA URL placeholders.
frontend/android-twa/build.gradle: Top-level Gradle build file configuring repositories and the Android Gradle plugin.
frontend/android-twa/gradle.properties: Gradle configuration enabling AndroidX, Jetifier, and JVM memory settings.
frontend/android-twa/README.md: Documentation explaining how to package the web app as an Android TWA with prerequisites and project structure.
frontend/android-twa/settings.gradle: Configures plugin and dependency repositories and includes the app module.
Quick setup steps for configuring the TWA project, mainly updating the deployed app URL.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining OKLCH color variables and dark/light theme behavior.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point including PWA metadata, manifest links, icons, and root React mount element.
frontend/public/.well-known/assetlinks.j: Digital Asset Links file used to verify the Android TWA with the website domain.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest describing app metadata, theme colors, icons, and display behavior.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker that caches static assets, cleans old caches, and serves requests with a network-first strategy and offline fallbacks.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling auth, profile setup flow, screen navigation, and service worker registration.
Displays the login screen with branding and triggers Internet Identity authentication.
App layout with header, logout handler, balance display, and themed background.
frontend/src/components/lobby/BalanceBad: Formats and displays a user’s coin balance inside a badge.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Dialog prompting new users to enter a display name and submit their profile.
frontend/src/components/responsible/Disc: Modal requiring users to confirm age and virtual‑coins disclaimer before proceeding.
Shows available game actions for the current player and triggers table actions via mutations.
frontend/src/components/table/CardDispla: Renders a player’s three cards, showing backs or placeholders based on visibility and pack status.
frontend/src/components/table/HandHistor: Displays a scrollable list of recent hand events derived from the table state.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDisclaimerAck.ts: Tracks and stores per-user disclaimer acknowledgment in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profiles, matchmaking queue, table state, game actions, and game settings using an actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for theming, including light and dark mode tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Implements service worker registration with update checks and provides an unregister helper.
frontend/src/screens/LobbyScreen.tsx: Renders the lobby UI, shows game rules, enforces disclaimer acknowledgment, and navigates to matchmaking.
frontend/src/screens/MatchmakingScreen.t: Automatically joins the matchmaking queue, displays queue size, and navigates to a table when assigned.
frontend/src/screens/TableScreen.tsx: Displays the active game table UI, player statuses, pot info, and auto-returns to lobby when the game ends.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters, storing them in sessionStorage, and cleaning parameters from the URL hash. Provides helpers for persisted URL values across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Metadata describing the project's PWA and Android TWA packaging goals, current features, issues, and requested work state.
